about_us.title: About Simpower Leagues
about_us.text: Simpower is a premier tier league organiser for the iRacing platform. We are a passionate and excited organising team committed to providing engaging, professional leagues that bring viewers closer to the action and closer to the edge of their seat.

quotes.name: Mehdi El Fathy, Owner / Creative Director of RaceKraft Esports
quotes.quote: We are really excited to be part of the PorscheSport.com Simpower Carrera Cup for the series' first season. The quality of the organisation is exemplary and a very strong field means this is the perfect series to practice for the Porsche Esports Supercup Pro Qualifiers
